ActCanada Labour Code
SubjectWork Place Harassment and Violence Prevention Regulations
PrecisWORK PLACE HARASSMENT AND VIOLENCE PREVENTION REGULATIONS in order to prevent and protect against harassment and violence, respond to occurrences and and support those affected by harassment and violence in the workplace.
